works.description:
Every time I post new content on my blog, it is copied to the infringing website and linked back to my own content which gives me spammy link for my own original content which was copied.    Here is a portion of my original content:

If achieving a positive attitude was all it took to have everything you want in life, would you do what it takes to make it happen?
Would you take the time to train your mind towards positive thoughts? I’m sure you would! Self hypnosis is one of the easiest ways to do so.
“Is the glass half full or is the glass half empty?”
Your answer to the question gives away what kind of outlook on like you have.
There is no denying that tough things can and do happen in your life. Sandy was facing bankruptcy and foreclosure which are both really tough things to face. She had been trying to keep it all together and finally she could deny it no longer.
This could have gone either of two ways.

Sandy could have stayed in bed each morning bemoaning the choices she made that led her down this wrotten path. She could have blamed the government, her family and her luck… anyone but herself.
Or she could think positive thoughts.
Realizing that things could actually have been worse, she could choose to look at the bright side of things. She didn’t deny that things were bad. Instead, she chose to use positive self talk to remind herself of the good things in life. She reminded herself that she was healthy and she would get over this.
Your life will change for the better with a positive attitude.
Whatever it is that you are going through in your life, you will get over it or through it much easier with positive thoughts. It’s not about putting your head in the sand and pretending things are good. It is about focusing on the positive aspects of any situation. There is always something positive to be found if you look for it.
Think about it for a moment, aren’t you naturally drawn to people with a positive attitude? I know that I am. I also see the difference in the way people treat me when I am feeling positive rather than when I am not feeling so good.
Achieving a positive attitude is easier than you think. You can do this too.
This ‘Positive Attitude’ self hypnosis download (also available as a CD) makes it easy for you to change your mindset into the kind of positive self talk that will turn your attitude upside down.
Your outlook on life will change all the way down to the core of your subconscious mind. You’ll be be better equipped to recognize and take advantage of opportunities that show up on your door. Others will notice that you feel better about yourself.
It is so simple to use a self hypnosis audio. All you do is:

Find a quiet place where you won’t be disturbed for a half hour
Close your eyes, listen and relax.

You can listen as often as you feel you need to. It’s even ok if you fall asleep while you are listening.
I think the best answer is that the glass is always full. When you thinkg about it, you realize the glass is filled half with water and half with air.
That’s the way Sandy decided to look at it.
All my best,

p.s. Here’s where you start achieving a Positive Attitude formatted in either a cd or mp3. You may also like to check out Positive Thinking :)

Check out some of these related articles:

Every time I post new content on my blog, it is copied to the infringing website and linked back to my own content which gives me spammy link for my own original content which was copied.    Here is a portion of my original content:

Think for a moment about your reasons for giving up smoking.
Perhaps you want to improve your health. There may be some worries about cancer or heart attacks. You may be troubled by coughing or have difficulty breathing.
Using self hypnosis to quit smoking can put your mind at ease.
You realize that once you commit to quit smoking, cigarettes and smoking will no longer affect your health. Instead, you’ll be dancing at your grandchildren’s wedding, traveling around the world or enjoying a nice refreshing walk.
Some smokers believe that there are no health implications involved with smoking. You believe that it can’t happen to you.
“I’ll believe it when I see it. Nothing has happened to me yet.”
You don’t want to carry an oxygen tank on wheels. It’s a very real possibility if you continue to smoke.
Some continue to smoke, believing that it relaxes you. You program yourself into believing it, when in reality, nicotine doesn’t cause relaxation.
“Help Me Quit Smoking”
For example, one hypnosis client said “Help me quit smoking.” When she smokes, she is reminded of the feeling of being ‘cool’ in high school. Now that she is older and has a family, smoking a cigarette quickly brings that feeling back for her.

It can be helpful to know the root cause of this compulsive habit, but whether or not you do, you can still break the habit.
After all, you weren’t born with the habit. If you can learn how to do something one way, then you can learn how to do it another way.
Self hypnosis can help.
When you use self hypnosis you begin to think like a non-smoker which means that you won’t even think about cigarettes. You won’t even give it a second thought.
All my best,

p.s. Here are a few suggested resources:
Click here now for more resources to stop smoking by hypnosis.

Here are some popular articles I think you will enjoy:

Every time I post new content on my blog, it is copied to the infringing website and linked back to my own content which gives me spammy link for my own original content which was copied.    Here is a portion of my original content:

The best stress reducers are the ones that you can easily incorporate into your daily life.
When you allow stress to build, it leads to more likelihood of getting sick or injured. You might end up with the pain of a tension headache or even worse, a migraine.
Pain from a backache can worsen to the point where you have to take a few days off work just to take care of yourself. It ususally happens when you can least afford to.
Everyday Hassles Cause the Most Stress
It turns out that it isn’t usually the big life events that cause the most stress. It is the everyday hassles that come and go naturally.
You wake up and realize that your alarm clock didn’t work and you are going to be late for your flight. As you rush to get ready, you spill coffee on your clothes. When you finally get into the car, you realize that you are almost out of gas because your teenage daughter didn’t fill the tank. (My kids ALWAYS leave the tank empty for me :)
You ‘grin and bear it’ by attributing it to your busy way of life.
The stress builds to the point where it has become a chronic condition and you actually become used to it. Or so you think.
Truth is, your body needs a little relief from all this stress on a regular basis. Your body needs a chance to recover before the next onslaught of stress. You will be better able to handle what life brings your way.
Best Stress Reducers to Use Everyday
When you incorporate a little bit of stress reduction into your daily life, you will recover much quicker when you face a stressful situation.

Music
One of the best ways to calm your nerves is to listen to relaxing music. This is something you can do almost any time or place.
Self Hypnosis / Meditation
Self hypnosis is a proven method used for many things and dealing with stress is one of them. Meditation is very similar to self hypnosis but there is one big difference.
With meditation, you are emptying and clearing your mind of cluttered thoughts. With self hypnosis, you are filling your mind up with thoughts and ideas that will directly make an impact on your goals.
If your goal is to relax and reduce stress, then self hypnosis will easily help you.
Laughter
There is a reason that clowns roam hospital halls cheering up sick children. it is because laughter reduces stress. Bring some laughter into your life by watching a funny movie, read the comics or telling a joke. When you can laugh at the things that have gone wrong, it will lighten your spirit and lessen the tension you may be feeling.
The best stress reducers are the ones that are the easiest to use, aren’t they?
All my best,

p.s. Check out our full selection of downloads, cd’s and books here.

his book by Dr. Richard Bandler delivers all you need to find happiness.Using his signature ‘recipe’ style formula, Bandler provides exercises that you can immediately put to use.That’s what I enjoy so much about his books.When I interviewed Richard Bandler for my radio show, he revealed to me that in the past he had worked with so many people to get rid of their problems. Once they did, they found they had a lot of extra time to fill.This book is designed to fill that space.Not only do you want to get rid of the bad habits but you want to good habits and expectations to take its place.There are many applications throughout that will help you soak up the lessons and put them into action. Each one is designed to will bring you more happiness.Richard Bandler is quick to point out that we can’t avoid stress altogether. In fact, stress is not the thing that keeps you from being happy. Stress is a necessary part of living.It’s how you look at stress that determines how happy you are.This book was written with the layman in mind as the father of NLP (Neuro-Linguistic Programming) provides a way to change the way you look at life so that you can find the happiness that you deserve.By the end of the book, I know you’ll feel a little bit happier.See more great Self Help Hypnosis mp3′s, cd’s and books.Shop safe at Amazon and enjoy free shipping if you spend $25 or more.You’ll find a full list of Richard Bandler Resources here.

Every time I post new content on my blog, it is copied to the infringing website and linked back to my own content which gives me spammy link for my own original content which was copied.    Here is a portion of my original content:

The man in the red shirt felt he had to explain himself to me even though I was a complete stranger. “The lid wasn’t on tightly and it slipped from my hand”, he said.
He had just spilled the entire contents of his drink down his shirt, across the table and onto the floor. Disgusted with himself for the mess he made, he looked around the mostly empty restaurant until our eyes met. He gave me a sheepish grin and offered up his explanation before going in search of someone to clean it up for him.
I imagined that this wasn’t the first thing that had gone wrong today. He had probably overslept because he had forgotten to set the alarm the night before. After getting dressed in a hurry (the mismatched socks were a giveaway), he went to his car and it wouldn’t start. He tried to call for help but his cell phone battery died and he doesn’t have a house phone any more.
He finally gets a break from work, goes out for a quick lunch and… spills his drink.
Have you ever had one of those days where everything just seems to go wrong?
It isn’t the major life events that cause us the most stress.
It is the buildup of little things that happen throughout the day. You are constantly bombarded with stressors all day long. You are overloaded with too many things to do. There is too much noise around you.

Without relief, this kind of stress takes a toll on your health. It can lead to headaches, backaches, digestive problems and even heart disease. You might even find yourself having angry outbursts. Ever wonder why road rage is on the rise?
It doesn’t have to be that way.
Whatever you’ve been doing to manage your stress hasn’t been working.
If stress leads you to overeat, then you just end up gaining weight. If you relieve your stress by going on a shopping spree, you end up with empty pockets. You know that smoking, drinking and meds don’t work in the long run either… right?
Self hypnosis is an easy way to use your body’s natural relaxation response to remove stress instantly.
When you practice stress management on a regular basis:

You are much more likely to recover from the daily bombardment of tension.
You will take a more relaxed approach to life.
You’ll respond differently to daily situations as they arise so that stress doesn’t build up.

Self hypnosis allows you to life the weight of stress from your shoulders and that means you’ll avoid the buildup of future tension.
Get started using self hypnosis for stress relief right here.
I nodded to the man in the red shirt and agreed with him that they should have put the lid on tighter. I like to think that it made him feel just a little bit better.
All my best,

p.s. Check out our full selection of downloads, cd’s and books here.

Every time I post new content on my blog, it is copied to the infringing website and linked back to my own content which gives me spammy link for my own original content which was copied.    Here is a portion of my original content:

Self motivation tips for golf are important because being a good golfer requires drive and persistence.
You don’t get good overnight – you have to go out there and practice in order to improve.

Sometimes you just don’t have the attitude and motivation to make a start.
The good news is, you can develop motivation yourself.
Here are 5 self motivation tips you can use:
1. Have a Goal Buddy
This works on the good old fashioned principle of friendly competition. Nobody wants to give in and admit their friend is more motivated, so you have an incentive to get off the couch and practice. It may not be the purest of motives, but it works. Improving at any skill is all about learning what’s effective.

2. Understand Peaks and Plateaus
There will be times when you slug away for weeks or months on end without feeling like you’re improving. Some people decide to give up at this point – these are the people who don’t understand how acquiring a new skill works.
Learning is never a steady upward slope. Acquiring a skill consists of a quick burst of improvement, followed by a relatively long plateau. You have to get used to that plateau. While it may appear on the surface that you’re not improving, the plateau is when you consolidate your skill gains and lay the groundwork for the next big leap in improvement.
3. Form a Routine
It may be the case that your work life doesn’t allow for much practice, but the fact is most people can rearrange their weekly schedule to make room for golf practice if they really care about getting good. Often saying you have no time is simply an avoidance mechanism and an excuse so you don’t have to make an honest effort to improve. If you’re used to being mediocre at everything, your mind starts to convince you that’s the way it should be. It then becomes very hard to excel at a sport.

Commit to a practice routine for at least one day a week. The improvements will accumulate over time if you stay consistent.
4. Reward Yourself
Make an arrangement with yourself to give yourself a small reward after every practice. This gives you some motivation to get through the hard work, because you know there’s something good at the end of it.
Alternatively, combine this with Tip 1 and have a mutual reward system going between you and your friend – for example, you pay him $10 if you don’t show up to practice. This makes it harder to get off the hook.
5. Use Hypnosis for Motivation
Hypnosis for motivation is a powerful tool. Hypnosis is a quick way to alter deeply entrenched thought patterns without a lot of slow, difficult self-development work. You can learn to hypnotize yourself or look into sessions with a professional hypnotist in order to remove bad habits like procrastination.
When you follow these self motivation tips, your game of golf will improve.

Hypnosteps: STOP SMOKING for LIFE Guided Hypnosis & NLP CD
Do you need to quit smoking?
Maybe your lungs are hating you right now…when you try to exercise or even just walk up the stairs.
Whatever your reason (and I know you have one) decide that now is the time to make it happen.
What I like about this hypnosis CD is that it also includes NLP techniques.
You’ll figure out what your triggers are and nip them in the bud. If you like to smoke as soon as you get in your car…that’s a trigger. Or maybe you want a cigarette when you have a cup of coffee. You might even think smoking is relaxing. Physically it does not relax you. You know what IS relaxing?
Self hypnosis is relaxing.
If you are not sure what it feels like, I’ll tell you.
It feels like when you are laying in bed in the morning and you are not quite asleep and yet you are not quite awake either. You are sort of in between. It feels so good.
